roleset.name: perform a vocal accompaniment

example.name: passive, all args
example.text: Cardboard noisemakers , substitutes for the unavailable tin models , werebeing hawked and bought at makeshift stands every few yards alongBroadway , and one 's ears were continually serenaded [*]by the horns 'rasps and bleats .

example.name: transitive
example.text: Outside , in the summertime fields behind the motel , a thousand cricketsserenaded us .

roleset.note: SERENADE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. No VerbNet entry. (from serenade.01-v)
